#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
//#include <bits/stdc++.h>
long long kk[200000];
long long check[200000];
using namespace std;
int main(){
	char k[100010];
	scanf("%s",k);
	long long l=strlen(k);
	//long long a[l];
	long long min=0;
	long long dummy=0;
	long long max=l+1;
	long long offset=-1;
	long long ans=((l+2)*max)/2;
	//cout<<(l+2)<<endl;
	//cout<<max<<endl;
	//cout<<ans;
	for(long long i=0;i<l;i++){
		dummy=0;
		if(k[i]=='C')offset++;
		while(k[i]=='C'){dummy++;i++;}
		while(dummy--) {
		    while(kk[l-min-offset+1]){offset++;}
			while(kk[l-dummy-min-offset]) min++;
			kk[l-dummy-min-offset]=1;
			//cout<<l-dummy-offset-min<<" x "<<endl;
			cout<<l-dummy-offset-min<<" ";
			ans=ans-(l-dummy-offset-min);
			//if(ix==1)min++;
			
		}
		min++;
		if(k[i]=='T') {
			while(kk[max]==1){max--;}
			kk[max]=1;
			ans=ans-max;
			//cout<<max--<<" y "<<endl;
			cout<<max<<" ";
			//offset++;
			//cout<<l-min-offset<<"  xxx   "<<endl;
			//min++;
			//ans=ans-max-1;
		}
		
		
	}
	cout<<ans;
	//system("pause");
	
}
